welcome.heading: Hi {{name}}, welcome to Microsoft To Do for Jira!
welcome.introText: This app allows you to see all your relevant Jira issues in you personal To Do app. To get started, just select an option below - you can switch any time!
welcome.simpleConfigDescription: Choose this if you are new to Microsoft To Do or just want to get started without much configuration.
welcome.advancedConfigDescription: Choose this if you already know your way around To Do and Jira very well. This let's you configure evert single detail.

simpleConfig.heading: Simple mode it is!
simpleConfig.introText: This app allows you to add new tasks from any issue or configure an automatic sync. If you are not using Microsoft To Do yet, make sure to check out the app first!
